lyrics.text: Verse 1
Flying the cosmos, passing UFO's
Glidin' thru' portals, piercin' ozone
Brought a gift for the game
Here's some gas cologne
Set  ablaze n thru flame's, establish a name
With a glow so insane, quantum physics on my brain
I'm hotter than plasma, smoother than Viagra
I'm cruising worlds with their girl, they're losing...
lyrics.annotation: A nod to the Nintendo 64 game Cruisin' World. A time when life was much simpler. All the boys would drive sports cars, and my sister would play as the mack truck, and try to bulldoze us off the track.

lyrics.text: Hook
How could an alien be so appealing?
Don't want your mumbles no more
How could an alien be so appealing?
Don't want that shit no more
Verse 2
How many times I need to remind you guys?
No Purple, Sprite on my time device
Now we're back in a time
When killers dined on lives
And for the last time
Step aside Dahmer I don't need your assistance
I'm already making a killing over here man
By grinding these rappers into grain
From farm to table they're fucking Raisin Bran...
Hook
How could an alien be so appealing?
Don't want your mumbles no more
How could an alien be so appealing?
Don't want that shit no more
Verse 3
Not many words describe their shit
But I'll give it a rip...
I'm supercalifragilisticexpialidocious
They're floccinaucinihilipilification
lyrics.annotation: A slap in the face. They wont know what this means

lyrics.text: I'm hotter than cajun, filletin' like Flay
lyrics.annotation: Bobby Flay's boring, but hey, it fit the rhyme scheme.

lyrics.text: Plating like Ramsay, Michelin stars
lyrics.annotation: A nod to Gordon Ramsay. However, I transcend beyond his Earthly level of skills, and zoom off into the cosmos.

lyrics.text: Off your radar, it's superfluous
Dispersing verses, unrehearsed to hearses, in universes
They're supernova now...
